Help Santa collect gifts!
The Elves are misbehaving and up to mischief! They have a few pranks up their sleeves for Santa!
How many gifts can you collect?
Merry Christmas and enjoy!

name: Snake Quest
summary:
Snake Quest is a version of the classic snake game which is extremely popular. The game runs in beautiful full screen in clear definition on the iPad. There are puzzle games, race against time features, endless random levels, and more! The main goal is to get all the jewels in a level, but beware of running into yourself, spikes or fire walls.
The app includes over 45 unique, vastly challenging levels in four worlds that bat an eyelash or two to popular culture while engaging players with diverse challenges. Not satisfied with these levels? Don’t sweat it, Snake Quest includes 190 additional levels in eight worlds that you can access via in-app purchase whenever you want.

name: Snowfury
summary:
Snowfury is a single map wad for Boom set in an snowy castle featuring classic styled gameplay. The level should take around 15-20 minutes to complete, and provide a decent challenge. Difficulty levels are supported. Freelook is fine, but avoid jumping.

The main gimmick of the map is that it uses a snow effect that doesn't require decorate or a more advanced engine, inspired by the old map "nordhell" by Eternal/Deadall. The effect can break down if you look at it too closely but most of the time it looks pretty nice.

name: Snowman Attack
summary: Your snow fort is under attack. Defend it at all costs against the ruthless snow army.

name: Snap Kid's
summary: Snap Kid's is a TCG / RPG hybrid that involves photographing monsters.

name: Snow Blocks
summary: Snow Blocks is an addictive 3D puzzle game where you have to break snow blocks! Your task is to destroy the blocks so that the ice blocks are on the ground! But be careful, there are other rules in the game!

name: Sniper Elite 5: Concealed Target Weapon and Skin Pack
summary: Hunt the enemy and strike from the shadows with an expanded cache of camouflage gear and a stealthy pistol at your side.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Complete Edition
summary: Sniper Elite 5 Complete Edition includes the base game, Season Pass One, and Season Pass Two.

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Back To School Edition
summary:
This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack, Weaponry Upgrade and Elite Arsenal with:

- With the Expansion Pack you can fight and survive the zombie apocalypse in a brand new game mode!
- Play new maps or revisit old ones with new weapons.
-PIS-30-ARM pistol: a reliable sidearm
-FMS-1-LEO rifle: a versatile and adaptable rifle for any situation
-SN-1000-FUT sniper rifle: a state-of-the-art weapon with cutting-edge features for ultimate accuracy
-RVL-357-WES pistol: a classic revolver with a timeless design
-BK-47-CAM rifle: a rugged and reliable rifle inspired by the old west
-SN-1100-TRI sniper rifle: a modern-day cowboy sniper rifle

Conquer your enemies in the wild west style!

name: Snakes LTD VR
summary: Casual Snakes Combat. Kill other snakes and grow as much as you can.

name: Snow Angel
summary:
"What if when you wished for something, someone answered?"

Snow Angel is a heart-warming love story between a human and an angel involving fluff, baking and falling snow. Pick your own pronouns and experience a charming tale within the alps.

name: Sniper Wild West Shooting Simulator
summary: Experience the thrill of sniping in the Wild West! Realistic FPS experience awaits you with Sniper Wild West Shooting Simulator. Shoot your enemies with one shot and become the best sniper.

name: SnL
summary: The essence of the game is very simple and understandable even to younger children.

name: Sniper Hunter Shooter
summary: For game lovers seeking realism, Sniper Hunter Shooter is an experience not to be missed! Fight as a sniper in a post-apocalyptic world, create your strategy, and test your shooting skills.

name: Snaky Survivor
summary: Navigate the stark world of Snaky Survivor, an arcade game that pits you against starvation and challenges your survival instincts. Guide a snake-like character as it gathers soul fragments to stave off hunger, weaving through hazardous obstacles in a race against time.

name: Sneaky Peeky
summary: Time for being stealthy! Dive into the shadows of Sneaky Peeky and experience real multiplayer stealth action. Use the environment to conceal your presence and avoid getting caught. Find ways to disrupt enemy team. Discuss your strategy and be sneaky!

name: Snowdrop the Blade Master
summary: It's a deck building roguelike game with a feature, where the card you played leave a shard that can be used as an extra assistance that will help you to reach your goal.

name: Snakes LTD
summary: Casual Snakes Combat. Kill other snakes and grow as much as you can.

name: Snake Challenge
summary: Snake Challenge is a mobile browser game that is playable as a part of the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment package.

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Elite Edition
summary: This bundle includes base game, Expansion pack, Weaponry Upgrade and Target Acquired.

name: Snook
summary: Snoook doesn't end, so please stop playing when it no longer brings you joy.

name: Snow Question
summary: Snow Question is a 2D math game where a math teacher is stuck in a snowball that you play as. He is trying to guess the right direction with his calculations. Try to steer the coma towards the snowflake with the correct solution to the equation.

name: Snoman's Land
summary: A kaizo Super Mario World ROM hack.

name: Sniper Team 2
summary:
Sniper Team 2 is the sequel to the classic Sniper Team game. Gather up your squad and defend the objective from the enemy in this first-person action game. Sniper Team 2 features a 10-mission campaign, spread across a few different maps and locations, and a separate Spec Ops game mode that unlocks after you’ve beaten the game. So no matter what you’re doing, you’re in for a sniping good time.

Each mission puts you into the shoes of four different soldiers, each positioned in a different part of the map. You can cycle between them for the best vantage point on the enemies. In the later levels, you’ll be switching between them constantly.

name: Snot Put
summary: Snot Put - A Nitrome Game. Pick, lick and flick your way to success getting the maximum distance!

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Aniversary Edition
summary: This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack and Target Acquired.

name: Snezhnaya Koroleva
summary: Snow Queen is an unlicensed game based on the 2012 Russian movie based on the same game. The game is a rom hack of Mick And Mack as the Global Gladiators with entirely new levels.

name: Snezhnaya Koroleva
summary: Snow Queen is a bootleg NES game based on the 2012 movie Snow Queen.

name: Snakes On A Cartesian Plane
summary: The mother of all snake games with 28 variations on that game you played on your candy bar cellphone.

name: Snail Simulator
summary: Have you ever wanted to be a snail? Now you can be! Move around (very slowly)! Look at the beautiful (low poly) scenery! MMOS (Massive Multiplayer Online Snails)! BECOME a snail (in a simulation)!

name: Snow Blocks 2
summary: In the game you will find many levels of varying difficulty and different blocks that you have to destroy! Read the game from start to finish, solving interesting puzzles! Whether you can walk this path depends only on you!

name: Snowlord
summary: In this minesweeper-like game made for Ludum dare 54, player must dig snow to build castles while avoiding getting caught.

name: Snakehaus
summary: Become the snake artist that solves puzzles through paintings. Every move that you make in the painting board will change the level, so be as creative as you can in this open ended puzzle game, as you are the artist and it is up to you how you solve the puzzles.

name: Snake Crush Survivors
summary: This is a Roguelite game that combines the gameplay of Snake with survivor mechanics. You will play as a large snake roaming above the city, clearing countless small monsters and spirits attracted by spiritual energy, as well as those frenzied large monsters.

name: Sniper Elite VR: Winter Warrior
summary: Grab your rifle and make your way behind enemy lines with Sniper Elite VR: Winter Warrior.

name: Snack Pack 3: Trick or Treat
summary: In the third installment of the Snack Pack series, mappers came together to contribute maps toward an 8-map Halloween-themed episode, with 3 extra maps in the hub as bonus levels. The pack includes a new 'Penetrator' stake gun weapon, the Rotary Shotgun from Dwell, and the Gaunt from Quoth as well as an updated Copper mod that features new Nightmare mechanics!

name: Snapware ft. Tchabada
summary: Snapware ft. Tchabada is a Mini Game Compliation Game

name: Snaketris: Rescue 'em all
summary: Oh no! Someone is capturing all the birds around the world. It's time for you to rescue them! Snaketris is a puzzle mashup of two classics where your main goal is to liberate all the trapped birds. Unlock cages, collect keys, use bombs and items in your way to become an animal hero!

name: Snooze or Lose
summary: Submission for the Play Jam 4!

name: Snacktorio
summary:
Snacktorio is a factory-cooking simulator where you must satisfy the appetites of unspeakable horrors... with food!

Build and manage sprawling networks of machines & pipes to mass produce delicious meals that can satiate the endless hunger of the beasts that are invading your home. Order Up!

name: Snap Together
summary:
Snap Together is a puzzle party game for up to 4 people on a single console! Assemble models with your friends or by yourself.

Play with your friends in Multiplayer mode and solve puzzles together or challenge them in Tournament mode. In Tournament mode, there is only one winner! Use power-ups to mess up other players and win.

name: Snake Galaxy Online
summary: Snake Galaxy Online is a 3D game based on the famous Snake. Travel the universe, save the people of the stars and defeat evil in this fun adventure for all ages.

name: SnowRunner: Jack of All Treads Tire Pack
summary: You can customize your SnowRunner experience further with the Jack of All Treads Tire Pack, adding over 50 unique tire & rim combinations for your whole fleet!

name: SnowRunner: Kenworth W990
summary: Expand your SnowRunner garage with the 2023 Kenworth W990! This Heavy-class truck brings superior on-road capabilities thanks to its retractable axle and superior fuel capacity. The Kenworth W990 is not included in the Year 1, Year 2 or Year 3 Pass.

name: Snack Of The Kitty
summary: Explore Snack of the Kitty, a platformer featuring adventurous cat Kitty on a quest for tasty snacks. Use her plasma weapon to defeat foes, uncover secrets, and traverse mysterious portals. An exhilarating adventure!

name: Snow Bros. 2 Special
summary: Snow Bros. 2 Special is a remake of the 1994 arcade game Snow Bros. 2 by ToaPlan. It features new graphics, new stages, new game modes such as Time Attack, Survival, and Sky Run, and supports local and online multiplayer for up to four players. Players can also enjoy the original version of Snow Bros. 2, as the original score was one of the most popular requests from players.

name: Snowman Story
summary: Bundle up and get cozy with this warm winter tale about one snowman's journey to the North Pole. Can he make it there before spring arrives?

name: Snow Plowing Simulator: First Snow
summary: Snow Plowing Simulator - First Snow invites you to an immersive winter experience! Command a fleet of powerful snowplows, tackling realistic snowy landscapes. This free-to-play simulation adventure game challenges your plowing skills in dynamic weather conditions. Sit, relax, and plow

name: Snoopy's Magic Show DX
summary: No one asked for it, but here it goes! Snoopy’s Magic Show is a total classic for the DMG, a very simple yet addictive single-screen arcade now in full color!

name: Snatchy Carrots
summary: Snatch 'dem carrots!

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Ultimate Edition
summary:
Hunter Scope you will shoot, you will fight, and you will win!

Play S.N.I.P.E.R., the latest sniping game where you aim, fight and destroy virtual enemies. Try different types of missions, inspired both by classic rail shooters and modern cover shooters. Fight your way out during day and night, destroy evil forces and unlock new weapons and power-ups.

name: SNQZ
summary: Try to be the biggest and meander your way to the top.

name: Snake Effect
summary: This is a very cool role-playing Snake game. Our design focuses on the combat experience of each character, spending a lot of time adjusting scene effects, skill effects, sound effects, and game difficulty. Now each greedy snake has 8 different skills.

name: Snow Day
summary: a short wii sports fan visual novel about honesty and realizing that you're in love

name: Snap! A Cerrado Adventure
summary: Explore Brazil's beautiful Cerrado region, meet the creatures who live there, and experience a future made possible by conservation and habitat restoration.

name: Snail Trainer
summary: A promotional game for Crazy Chicken X, taking place in the same setting as the former.

name: Snap Together + Pool Together Bundle
summary: Take the plunge into endless fun and excitement with Pool Together - the ultimate pool game experience and Snap Together - an amazing puzzle party game!

name: Sniper: Elite Shooter Squad
summary: "Sniper - Elite Shooter Squad" immerses players in the high-stakes world of precision marksmanship.

name: Snap Together: New Challenges
summary:
Solve a dozen of puzzles with your friends in Snap Together and have more with New Challenges!
Snap Together is a puzzle party game for up to 4 people on a single console! Assemble models with your friends or by yourself.

Play with your friends in Multiplayer mode and solve puzzles together or challenge them in Tournament mode.

In Tournament mode, there is only one winner! Use power-ups to mess up other players and win.

name: Snap Together: New Challenges
summary:
Prepare for New Challenges in Snap Together!
Boost the fun levels with your friends! Now we have 54 more exciting levels for you to showcase your skills.

No more boredom – just a thrilling time together! Dive into the Snap Together with a new DLC and feel the excitement of competition. Are you ready for new challenges?

Let the game begin!

name: Snow Moto: Racing Adventure
summary: Rev your snowmobile through crisp mountain air, conquering treacherous terrains with thrilling speed.

name: Sneak '95
summary: Transmit a message through the internet tubes.

name: SnowRunner: 4-Year Anniversary Edition
summary:
The ultimate off-road experience!

Drive over 70 powerful vehicles and overcome extreme open environments. SnowRunner's 4-Year Anniversary Edition includes the base game as well as the Year 1, Year 2, Year 3 and Year 4 Passes.

name: Snezhinka: Sentinel Girls 2
summary: A high-tempo shooter with simple controls. Enhance your character with cards and defend various targets as an employee of a private military company.

name: SnowRunner: Year 4 Pass
summary: The Year 4 Pass allows you to expand your SnowRunner experience by granting you access to four seasons of content, including new vehicles, new skins, new missions, new maps to explore and more.

name: SnowRunner: Year 1 Pass + Year 2 Pass + Year 3 Pass + Year 4 Pass
summary: Upgrade your game and get ready for the ultimate off-road experience! SnowRunner’s Year 1 Pass + Year 2 Pass + Year 3 Pass + Year 4 Pass grants you access to 16 seasons of content - including 4 expansions - from the Year 1, Year 2, Year 3 and Year 4 Passes.

name: Snake Colors: Slithering Game
summary: Move the colorful snake to destroy the hurdles with the same colors but avoid the ones with different colors.

name: Snowpult
summary: Frosty Cookie clicker with a mad dash of ice cold humour, hit the targets by slinging snowy balls of fury and hope the games narrator isn't awake to mock your failures.

name: Snow Cone Serenade
summary: Snow Cone Serenade is a short and sweet liminal adventure. Choose your mood and roll the dice to succeed or fail in spicy situations. Enter a cursed snow world to save your sick dog, Jedediah. Unravel a mind-bending mystery to face your innermost fears.

name: Snake-O-Tron
summary: Snake-O-Tron is a fast-paced arcade game that combines the classic snake gameplay with the racing and power-up elements of Mario Kart, all set in a futuristic Tron-like world.

name: Snake
summary: A Snake game. Usually only appears in models with four directional buttons. In which the player tries to obtain the randomly placed "fruit" in the playfield without touching a wall or themselves. Rather then continually get longer like you would in Snake, however, the player stops growing after eating only 13 fruits, causing the snake to restart to beginning size, and creating another maze of obstacles. This in turn makes it more of a game of endurance rather then strategy.

name: Snufkin: Melody of Moominvalley - Cherished Keepsakes
summary: Many treks and adventures leave wanderers with lasting memories, and while Snufkin doesn’t usually carry a lot with him, over time he’s picked up some things that he always wants to keep close. Journey through Moominvalley with the cherished keepsakes that Snufkin takes with him wherever he can.

name: Snap-A-Game: Classic RPG
summary: Make your own game! With Snap-A-Game RPG, you can snap together your own classic RPG within minutes! Put together your own enemies and NPC's using over 60 body parts and over 1,000,000 possible character combinations! Build your own customized weapons and weapon shops; draw your own overworld maps using tiles for grass, snow, sand, stone and lava; and interlink as many overworld maps as you want for almost unlimited game play possibilities! NOTE: This program is for entertainment purposes only and is not for professional game development. These games cannot be sold and contain copyrighted material.

name: Snakslad
summary: A simple simulation of the classic game of Snakes and Ladders. Choose your piece (+ or *) and then hit a key to role a dice for each. The winner is the player who makes it to the last (red) square first. If you land on the head of a snake, you slide down to the bottom of its tail. If you land at the bottom of a ladder, you ascend to the top of it.

name: Snow Drift
summary: Take out penguins and avoid the arctic enemies using your drifting abilities.

name: SnowRunner: Salt of the Earth Vinyl Wrap Pack
summary: The Salt of the Earth Vinyl Wrap Pack adds four exclusive skins for the ANK MK38, International Paystar 5070, Caterpillar CT681 and Western Star 6900 TwinSteer trucks. This Pack is included in the Year 4 Pass and immediately available upon purchase.

name: Snow White Ashes
summary: Lose your heart in this dark fairy-tale romance! Once upon a winter night, you enter the woods in search of a beast. But the hunter you find is so charming and sweet–is he truly the monster you seek?

name: Sneaky Snacks
summary: Take the role of a chef who has been given the task to cook the kings royal feast. There is only one problem... The snacks are missing! Embark on a hidden object journey where you must find over 20 different snacks across 20 medieval style levels while not running out of time!

name: Snekris
summary: A unique blend of classic snake gameplay and innovative gameplay mechanics. Achieve the highest score by smartly navigating Snekkie, your ever-hungry serpent, through a dynamic world with many special items and dangerous obstacles.

name: Sniper Rescue
summary: Take to the roof tops and save the innocent

name: Snowy Flag
summary: Snowy Flag is a 3D car game in which an exciting adventure awaits you! You have to drive a van on snowy roads and collect flags! Show dexterity and skill in driving vehicles to successfully overcome all obstacles on your way!

name: Sniperbot: The Hype Game
summary: SNIPERBOT: THE HYPE GAME is a retro styled, rhythm-based action platformer; It’s Mega Man meets Crypt of the NecroDancer. The player traverses through the cybertech world of Meta Metro. Where Hypebeasts run wild, clout is currency and the only way to survive is attacking your enemies and fighting boss battles with a blaster and sword, all while keeping on beat to a late 80s / early 90s Hip Hop soundtrack!

name: Snip It!
summary: A 2D Qix-like retro arcade game. Draw lines to capture the canvas and defeat enemies!

name: Snyatcher
summary: Granny’s gone and the cats are going crazy! Solve this cat-astrophe by chasing the cats through this 3D platforming cat collectathon. Use your gadgets and athletic abilities to put a stop to the feline chaos and solve the mystery of Granny's disappearance!

name: Snake.io+
summary: This is a port of Snake.io exclusively for Apple Arcade that removes all the ads and microtransactions.

name: Snake
summary: In this well-known game, the player takes control of a worm (or snake) which is constantly moving forward, eating mushrooms. The player can use the arrow keys to turn the worm, but must take care not to run into the surrounding walls, the obstacles, or the worm itself. Once the worm has eaten 5 regular mushrooms, doors open in the walls, through which the player can advance to the next level.

name: SnowRunner: The Atom
summary: The SnowRunner garage expands once more with the Azov 67096-3N “Atom”! This Heavy-class truck features a modern engine, always-on differential lock and all-wheel drive capability. This DLC is not included in the Year 1, Year 2, Year 3 or Year 4 Pass.

name: Snail Juice
summary: Reminiscent of Abe's Odyssey and Rayman. Journey through challenging levels to rescue snail friends trapped in a juice factory, facing off against relentless robots and security guards. Trade lives for cash, equip yourself with bombs and ammunition to conquer obstacles and snack on junk food.

name: Snow Blower: Idle Game
summary: Snow Blower - Idle Game is a Free to Play game where you'll blow away snow, employ helper robots, unlock upgrades, complete tasks and goals and much more.

name: Sneak Out
summary: A stealth-puzzle game where you play as a boy, trying to escape from his parents house to get to a party in hilarious and unique ways. Get ready to outsmart, fool and trick your parents to make the ultimate escape!

name: Snowboarders: Kiri Adventures
summary: A snowboarding game in which you pick as many coins as you can while doing backflips in the snowy hills. Avoid the rocks!

name: Snake Clash!
summary:
Snake Clash – A Snake Growth Battle Game Enjoyed by Over 100 Million!
Welcome to Snake Clash! The ultimate battle for survival in the world of snakes is about to begin.

Start as a hungry little snake, eat, grow, and fight to evolve into the biggest and most powerful serpent. Engage in thrilling duels in a fierce arena and become the last one standing!

name: Snails
summary:
Do you have what it takes to withstand the malevolent hordes of oversized mutants infesting your community?

And more importantly, do you have what it takes to relive the 90's all over again?

Play and find out!

name: SnapShot
summary: A game about shooting characters for points but you need to avoid killing the wrong people.

name: Snails
summary: "SNAILS" is a retro-themed 3-D brawler, generated within a primitive aesthetic which is designed to emulate the characteristics of late-90's era PS1 games.

name: Snatched!
summary: In "Snatched!", you play as an alien on a mission to secretly bring humans back to your spaceship. Explore a lively Earth setting, using stealth and alien gadgets to outsmart people. The game features speech-to-text technology, letting you talk directly to characters with your own voice. It's a fun mix of strategy and stealth, perfect for players who enjoy interactive and humorous gameplay.

name: Snail's Knock Out!
summary: From the asymmetrical party action game 'Goonya Monster' designed by Terada Tera , a spin-off work has emerged! Enemy in sight? Throw bombs! Blast away! "Snail's Knock Out" is a casual shooting game. Blast away the undead appearing in stages with increasing speed and relieve accumulated stress!

name: Sneaky Beings
summary: SneakyBeings is a fun party game where players disguise, impersonate, and either cooperate or brawl.

name: Snootz Math Trek
summary: An educational game where you work your way through various activities and games.

name: Snow Angel and Silver Devil
summary:
Once upon a time, in the woods near the sleepy town of Wolkendorf, Germany, there lived a healer named Catrin Rosenberg. On her way to her relatives' house for Heiligabend dinner, she crosses paths with the frosted behemoth known as the Silver Devil. But is he truly as fearsome as the tales claim?

What new and wondrous legends will be spun from this chance encounter between angel and devil? ...Well, that's up for you to decide, isn't it?

name: SnowRunner: Season 13 - Dig & Drill
summary: Season 13: Dig & Drill is included in the Year 4 Pass. Requires the base game SnowRunner to run.Authorities in Almaty need your help to kickstart a new mining venture! With 2 new vehicles, run surveys, deliver equipment and reopen a cargo airport.

name: Snowsquall Grip
summary: Escape the snowy nightmare or be trapped forever — your call.

name: Snoopy DS: Let's Go Meet Snoopy and His Friends!
summary: Snoopy DS: Let's Go Meet Snoopy and His Friends is a game developed by Square Enix for the Nintendo DS. It consists of several minigames covering a variety of gameplay types, linked together by a world in which the player can talk to Peanuts characters and perform simple quests for them.

name: Snatched
summary: Snatched plunges players into a high-stakes world where they are abducted and forced to compete in deadly card games. Set in a grim, blood-stained room, each round is a fight for survival against other captives, with the ever-present threat of violence looming.

name: Snowfall
summary: Help the beautiful babes escape from the obstacles overhead! This release includes holiday-themed HD graphics, intense, cooperative multiplayer, and a few surprises!

name: Snatch & Swallow
summary: This is an action rougelike game Players need to strategically select possession objects while also selecting various beneficial gain attributes that benefit them.

name: Snake Crossing
summary: Classic snake game with modern rules and infinite exciting. Play alone or with friends to fight against AI.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Airborne Elite Weapon & Skin Pack
summary: It’s Rebellion's 30th birthday and to celebrate we are giving you the Airborne Elite Pack for free. It gives you access to the stunning Lee No.4 rifle, an iconic Parachute Regiment Character Skin for Karl and a Union Jack Weapon Skin for the Welrod pistol.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Valentine's Weapon Skin Pack
summary: Celebrate Valentine’s Day by giving your M1911 the look of love with this free Cherry Hunter Weapon Skin. Download now for FREE to share the love.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Winter Weapons Skin Pack
summary: Go frosty with the new FREE Winter Weapons Skin Pack for Sniper Elite 5. This free pack gives you the option to apply an Arctic paint scheme to all your in-game weapons, giving them a distinct winter camouflage look. Your enemies will be frozen with fear, that’s if they even see you coming!

name: Sniper Elite 5: Up Close and Personal Weapon & Skin Pack
summary:
Prepare for close confrontation with a new character look and bolstered artillery of heavy fire weapons.

Equip the Win & Co 1885, a heavy-hitting rifle that despite its restricted rate of fire, houses an enormous .50 calibre 50-110 round, capable of eliminating any enemy in its path with a single shot.

Complimenting the Win & Co 1885 is the ERMA.36, a submachine gun that features an integral suppressor and high muzzle velocity, making for a heavy but powerful stealth SMG.

Available in both Karl and Monika variants, the Tank Top Character Skin features brown leather accents and a rough and ready combat look for traversing the battlefield.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Trench Warfare Weapon Pack
summary:
This FREE Weapons Pack gives you some devastating firepower perfect for close quarters combat in the shape of the Carl Gustav M/1945 SMG, the Trench Gun and a Double 1866 pistol.

The Carl Gustav M/1945, better known as the Swedish K, was adopted in 1945, taking features from various WWII firearms to produce a reliable and well-balanced sub-machine gun. Firing at 600 rounds-per-minute, the Gustav provides accurate single shots, whilst also offering great control in continuous fire.

A powerful pump-action shotgun, the Trench Gun first saw use by US Forces during World Wars I & II. Fed with 12-gauge shells from its 6-round tube magazine, it sacrifices range and fire rate for extreme damage in close quarters.

The Double 1866 is a double-barrel pocket pistol designed in the 19th Century as an easily concealable backup gun that can be drawn at speed. Despite only featuring a single-action trigger and producing a very low muzzle velocity, the D.1866's unique traits make for a powerful weapon at close range.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Death From Above Weapon and Skin Pack
summary:
Death From Above is the second content pack in Season Pass Two bringing a new rifle in the shape of the Pedersen, a weapon skin and two character skins.

The Pedersen rifle was proposed as part of a program to adopt a semi-automatic replacement to the M1903. It features no scope options but is arguably best-in-class for ironsight usage and is capable of firing fast, accurate shots at medium range, with great overall stability.

You will also receive the striking British Dazzle weapon skin, available for all weapons, pays homage to the dazzle camouflage design used on British tanks during desert campaigns.

Finally, both Karl and Monika receive new character skins. The British Bomber skin for Karl gives him a distinct aviator look while the Air Auxiliary skin for Monika reflects the uniforms worn by the women’s air-corps whose job was to transport new or repaired planes to active military airfields throughout the UK.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Saboteur Weapon and Skin Pack
summary:
Two new weapons and a Liberator character skin for Karl await in the latest content drop from Season Pass Two.

Both the Grease Gun and TERA rifle are now available as part of your arsenal. The TERA is a lightweight adaptation of the Type 38 that was originally designed for Japanese Paratroopers, this rifle is incredibly fast to equip and aim down the sight. With low levels of recoil, it provides both accuracy and a rapid rate of fire in the right hands.

Designed to be a light, reliable and mass-produced weapon, the Grease Gun is an SMG with great mobility that is very easy to control, even under sustained firing, thanks to its low rate of fire and recoil. Despite its low muzzle velocity, the stability and control on offer make it a solid choice for slightly longer ranged combat encounters.

Finally, the Liberator Skin celebrates the liberation of Paris. Karl can now sport a classic French Resistance appearance complete with signature armband.

name: Sniper Elite 5: P.1938 Suppressed Pistol
summary:
Equipped with the P.1938 Suppressed Pistol, you’ll gain the advantage of being able to quickly eliminate your enemies one-by-one with barely a sound to alert the rest of the squadron.

Originally an Axis Special Forces experimental prototype, in the hands of elite sniper Karl Fairburne, this weapon has just become even more deadly.

name: Snowman's Land
summary: A map based on Snowman's Land from Super Mario 64.

name: SNK vs. Capcom: SVC Chaos
summary:
SNK and CAPCOM legends clash in this star-studded crossover fighting game!
The 2003 arcade hit SVC CHAOS is back and better than ever!

SVC CHAOS—a dream match of epic proportions! Worlds collide as 36 iconic characters across various series from SNK (mainly THE KING OF FIGHTERS) and CAPCOM (mainly STREET FIGHTER) do battle in a frantic fight to the finish! Brand-new rollback netcode and tournament modes allow for fun, fast-paced online matches—all while still retaining the classic visuals and controls of the original fan favorite. Also comes with a hitbox viewer and a gallery mode! Rise up and throw down with players all around the world in this new evolution of the SVC CHAOS legacy!

name: Snow Bros. Wonderland
summary: Boasting gorgeous 3D isometric graphics, Snow Bros. Wonderland has the brothers defending Snow Land from The Great King of Evil! Armed with an endless supply of ice pellets, gamers can turn monsters into snowballs which can be kicked to destroy a whole horde of enemies! Chain your attacks to defeat several bad guys at once and use your snowball skills to take down massive bosses.

name: Snaps
summary: Dive into an anime-themed FPS and tower defense game! Battle cultists in dungeons, defend your village, and forge relationships with NPCs. Customize weapons and enjoy casino games. A thrilling blend of action and strategy!

name: Snowbound: Dead of Winter
summary: Snowbound is a roguelite farming game with tower defense elements. Build your farm, survive the night with a range of defenses, and complete missions to progress deeper into the forest.

name: Snowfall Symphony: A Tale of Crustallus
summary: Immerse yourself in a captivating visual novel set in a dark vampire world where romance and cruel decisions shape your fate, leading to multiple unique endings.

name: Sniper 3D
summary: Tired of learning things that just don't captivate your interest?

name: Snazzy and Groovy in Crystal Town
summary: Snazzy and Groovy in Crystal Town is a bite sized, story-focused RPG surrounding two cat friends and their relaxing holiday in a place called Crystal Town. However, something sinister brews beneath the surface... will you give the people of crystal town a hand? Or give them the cold shoulder...

name: Snap Snap
summary: SNAP SNAP is a first-person psychological horror game with an oppressive atmosphere and intense gameplay. Use your camera to escape the monster and solve some puzzles. Use the charge sparingly, as the battery may run out and while it is charging at the station... you are defenseless. The game has four endings. Will you be able to open them all? Beautiful graphics, oppressive atmosphere and high-quality sound will help you fully immerse yourself in the terrifying world of SNAP SNAP.

name: Snowmageddon
summary: Evil mutant snowmen have begun their attack on your home town! It is up to you to stop them with an arsenal of weapons!

name: Sniper Elite: Resistance
summary: Offering unparalleled sniping mechanics, stealth and tactical third-person combat, Sniper Elite: Resistance turns the attention of the award-winning series towards a hidden war, far from the front lines, deep within the heart of occupied France.

name: Snow Wave Community Project
summary: Snow Wave Community project is Christmas holiday project that ran from 2023 November to January 2024. Initially, there were 21 levels submitted, but for undisclosed reasons, it became 20 levels pack. Difficulty goes from easy to really hard, use difficulty skills provided if you find set too hard to manage!

name: Sniper Assassin 2
summary: Sniper Assassin 2 continues with Shawn’s story as both an agent for the government and a paid assassin. This shooter game is simple, take out your targets but don’t harm any civilians or you’ll lose the mission.

name: Snooker Blitz
summary:
Play snooker friends for free in Snooker Blitz. The only online snooker game you ever need.

The world is ready for a truly unique snooker game! Challenge your friends, enter snooker tournaments, and go head to head against other players in real-time. Shoot snooker with ultra-realistic physics, breath-taking graphics, and have more fun than you’ve ever had in real life!

name: Sniper Assassin 3
summary: Help elite sniper Shawn Davidson get the revenge he so desperately wants in this third installment of the Sniper Assassin series. Much like the previous games, in Sniper Assassin 3, you’re embarking on a series of missions, all of which with a specific target (or targets) that you must discover and take care of. The trick is discovering how to complete each mission. Make the wrong move, and it’s over.

name: Sniper Assassin 4
summary: The fourth chapter in the bloody game series for Sniper Assassin. Follow along with each mission in Shawn’s quest for revenge. Open a mission and read the description of your target. Pay attention to the details of your target so you don’t make a mistake!

name: Sniper Assassin 5: Final Mission
summary: In this final chapter of the Sniper Assassin saga, you’re chasing down the man responsible for everything in a series of puzzle-based sniper scenarios. Will he pay for what he’s done, or will he only be making a fool out of poor old Shawn?

name: Snow Fight
summary: A multiplayer snowball fight game using snowmen.

name: Snø: Ultimate Freeriding
summary: Snø is a raw, fast paced and challenging, yet minimalistic game about freeriding. Experience beautiful mountains inspired by Scandinavian nature and score points by doing risky moves like grinding on rocks, jumping off tree trunks and fly close to the treetops using your speedglider.

name: Snake 1
summary:
SNAKE 1 is a fast-paced one-button game.

Play Snake with just one button. Collect coins to score points and to make the snake grow in size. Press a button to rotate 90 degrees. You rotate clockwise initially, but you reverse your direction every time you collect a coin.

The game is over when you hit any of the borders of the screen or the snake hits its tail.

name: Snow Storm
summary: Snow Storm is a flash game where you clear the snow at a parking lot. Clearing many of the snow will cause an icon of hot chocolate to appear and will take you to the next level.

name: Snaky Snakes
summary: Snaky Snakes is an exhilarating game where player control a snake through randomly generated obstacles while collecting cherries. Each cherry increases the snake's length and score. Additionally, player can use cherries to purchase new environments such as Desert, Asia, and Ballroom from the in-game shop. The objective is to achieve the highest score possible and unlock all environments.

name: Snufkin: Melody of Moominvalley - Fuddler's Courtship
summary: In this heartfelt novella-like story of romance, newfound friend Fuddler needs a helping hand to express his feelings.

name: Snowboard Legends
summary: Get ready for a thrilling snowboarding adventure! This game lets you ride through 12 exciting tracks filled with jumps, sharp turns, and breathtaking snowy landscapes. Race down steep slopes, carve through icy forests, and discover hidden shortcuts.
developers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
publishers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

name: Sniper Jarhead
summary: Precision marksmanship and calm decision-making are crucial for this rescue mission. Feel the intense tension as you look through the scope and pull the trigger.

name: Snow Way Home
summary: A collection of 9 maps by the Waffle House Team that capture the essence of this magical time of year that feature falling snow and slippery ice. ﻿

name: Sniper Elite: Resistance - Deluxe Edition
summary:
2-Day Early Unlock
1 Weapon Skin
Karabiner 98 Rifle
M1911 Pistol
Target Führer Campaign Mission (2-Day Early Unlock)
Season Pass

name: Snakebird GB
summary: This is a Gameboy recreation / fangame of the amazing puzzle game Snakebird, containing 10 all new levels.

name: Snoopy no Hajimete no Otsukai
summary: The Japan-only sequel to Snoopy's Magic Show where Snoopy walks around in an isometric world doing Charlie Brown's shopping.

name: Snow Ash
summary: "Snow Ash" is a stand-alone independent game about running a business in the snowy wasteland developed by 3 people! The player plays the role of a courier who delivers goods on the snow. The delivery process will be presented in a light Rogue+DBG way, with some survival elements.

name: Snowboard Madness
summary: Strive to be the best as you ride the mountains.

name: Snowboarder XS
summary: Choose your character, snowboard down a realistic 2 km of piste, collect stars and perform amazing tricks in this fantastic game.

name: Snakeloop
summary: Snakeloop is a challenging puzzle game based on a simple idea: What if you took classic Snake but inverted the goal and made it so you have to form a loop by eating your own tail.

name: Snake in the Dark
summary: Sure, you've played Snake. But could you play it blind? Snake in the Dark is a total re-imagination of the timeless arcade and puzzle game classics like Snake and Sokoban. Fun gameplay you know delivered with more puzzling twisssts than you expect!

name: Snow Bros. Special: Anniversary Edition
summary: “It is a modern remake of Snow Bros., an arcade platform-based action game popular in 1990, characterized by its accessibility for people of all ages. It also provides diverse fun with new stages and new modes, and allows players to enjoy the original game as well.”

name: Snails vs. Humans
summary: Let the battle between snails and humans begin!

name: Snow Resort Simulator
summary: Step into the world of Snow Resort Simulator. Tackle daily responsibilities: upgrade facilities, maintain a cozy resort, satisfy guests with freshly cooked meals and drinks, and keep your inventory fully stocked. Be prepared for the challenges that come with winter.

name: SneakBit
summary: Awaken in a mysterious world teeming with danger, magic, and secrets. Collect keys, brave perilous dungeons, and confront the legendary Demon Lord—but beware, the prophecy holds surprises.

name: Snekmek
summary: A thrilling twist on the classic Snake game. Dodge bullets from evil fruits, collect weapons to arm your snake, and if hit, switch to platformer mode, flying with a jetpack to defeat the fruit enemies!

name: Snooker Fever
summary: The classic pool experience, right at home!

name: Snarewaves' Shooting Challenge
summary: A short, free high-score chasing 2D shooter set to a punk rock soundtrack.

name: Sniper at Work
summary: Sharpen your aim and embrace chaos in this action-packed single-player sniping experience. Scout targets, plan creative kills, and adapt when things go sideways. With dynamic missions, tactical freedom, and explosive surprises, every shot tells a story. Precision or mayhem - the choice is yours!

name: Snake.io
summary:
Develop your skills, try to survive as much as you can and become the biggest snake. You start as a small snake, get bigger by eating other snakes who try to do the same. You have to attack wisely but defend skillfully. How long can you survive?

Attack fast with the mass-eject booster and get in front of other snakes to beat them when they hit you head on, no matter how small you are or how big they are. The best one wins.

name: Snooker
summary: The first release of Snooker by Amsoft. After obtaining the license to use snooker champion Alex Higgins shortly after release, the game was pulled and reissued with the title 'Alex Higgins' World Snooker'.

name: Snail
summary:
Snail is a Kafkian story, where you find an absurd and fun world, full of color, objects without any logic and characters who, without a single word, will show you true feelings.

You will find a city full of surprises, details and references. You will feel like you are inside the city thanks to its careful setting, both visually and aurally.

This new reality is full of long things, rather, excessively long... Useless in some cases, in others curious, but always appealing to humor.

name: SnaPaul
summary:
The tragic horror story of a prank gone terribly wrong – a chilling horror experience.

SnaPaul is a first-person psychological horror game where you explore a dark, mysterious house. With 30/40 minutes of intense gameplay, every step brings you closer to a chilling finale. Face your fears and uncover hidden secrets in this unforgettable experience.

name: Snowman Mo
summary: One little snowman's adventure of a lifetime. Embark on a grand journey in this heartwarming single-player adventure game.

name: Snowy Memories
summary: A narrative-driven sci-fi game set in a world of artificial intelligence and androids, blending limited inventory survival strategy with Metroidvania elements. Players will manage their equipment and utilize weapon abilities to solve puzzles, face enemies.

name: Snow Buddies: Dog Sled Race
summary: Snow Buddies: Dog Sled Race is a promotional Flash Game based on the movie Snow Buddies.

name: Snap Quiz Challenge
summary: A fast paced trivia game for the sharp-minded!

name: Snap Flex
summary: Snap Flex is a fast-paced card game based on classic Snap. Match ranks or suits, play with points or winner-takes-all. Enjoy offline or online multiplayer with up to 4 players.

name: Snails Have Skeletons
summary: "The dark adventure game, Snails Have Skeletons, is a dark spin on the classic 16-bit adventure genre. Explore an interconnected world and battle lingering undead to uncover the mystery of the doom that befell the marsh." Genres: Exploration, Action, Adventure, Mystery, Dark Fantasy

name: Sniper Scope: Realistic Tactical Shooter
summary: Step into the shoes of an elite sniper and begin combat missions - disrupt enemy plans while remaining in the shadows. The army won't do where one perfect shot is needed.

name: SnowDown
summary: SnowDown is a shared-screen party game for up to 12 players using their phone or web browser as a controller. Unleash a flurry of snowballs on the other team as you race your forts to the top! Will your team stand victorious or will your hopes come crashing down?

name: SnowRunner: Season 14 - Reap and Sow
summary:
Season 14: Reap & Sow is included in the Year 4 Pass. Requires the base game SnowRunner to run.

Austrian officials need you to renovate their region's Renaissance castle and kickstart a new season of farming with 4 vehicles across two new 4km² maps.

name: Snaky Cat
summary: Guide your cat to EAT colorful candy donuts and GROW your cat LONG like a snake! Slither and ZOOM, feasting on donuts and BUSTING other opponents in the arena!

name: Snaker 3000
summary: An opinionated take on the classic Snake. Slither through the world in full 3D movement, breaking free from the old-school grid.

name: SnailShock Grand Supreme Tournament
summary: What if pool was snailsbut there are crazy cards, dice to roll and zany opps?

name: Snow Town Geek Store
summary: Become a shopkeeper in the first geek store in a snowy 2000s town: sell CDs, snacks, and fan merch, influence your customers' lives, get involved in shady business, and grow your small store.

name: Sneaky All-Nighter
summary: Let's stay up and play all night long! Be stealthy, don't get caught, and play the night away!

name: Snake King
summary: Snake King is a modern twist on the classic Snake game. Guide your snake through an open arena, eating fruit to grow longer while avoiding walls and your own tail. Simple to play, with increasing speed and difficulty—challenge yourself to beat your high score and become the Snake King!

name: Snackdown
summary: Collect, trade, and explore a world of food-themed fun! "Snackdown" is a lighthearted collectible card game featuring over 60 unique cards, ready for trading and showcasing. Perfect for casual players and collectors alike!

name: SnakeVib
summary: SnakeVib is a modern twist on the classic Snake game, featuring regenerating food, rotten food to avoid, and a competitive computer snake. With unique mechanics like 'Tug of War,' arrow shooting, and increasing speed, every level offers fresh challenges. Can you master all 10 levels?

name: Snakecremental
summary: Snake, but with a skill tree

name: Snow Cone
summary:
Snow Cone is a penguin-themed puzzle game where you arrange snowballs into elegant Snow Cones to match customers' orders in dozens of challenging puzzles. Meet interesting characters and expose the truth behind the city's shady penguin underbelly.

Features handcrafted puzzles, pixel-art graphics, and a jazz-inspired soundtrack.

name: Snow Problem
summary: Climb to the top of the mountain to become the winner.

name: Snekburd
summary:
Snekburd is a Pico-8 demake of Snakebird, by Noumenon Games, with new puzzles and mechanics! Navigate the snakebirds to eat all the fruit and head through the portal to complete the levels on each island. The first island's levels should serve as a quick tutorial to new players or a refresher for returning ones.

The full game has about 70 levels in it, ranging from a little tricky to absurdly hard, and is available for free (donations enabled with Noumenon Games' permission).

name: Snoopy's Street Fair
summary: Help Snoopy, Charlie Brown and the Peanuts gang build a street fair!

name: Snakes with Fists!
summary: A Beat 'em Up with RPG elements where you can explore an open world, level up, and customize your combat!

name: Sniper Elite: Resistance - Target Führer: Lights, Camera, Achtung
summary:
The Allies are swarming across Europe and gathering pace.
In a last-ditch effort to sway the favour of the French, Adolf Hitler, leader of the Third Reich, is en route to the Ville du Lac Film Studios to film a series of propaganda shorts.

name: Snail Mail
summary: Race to deliver THE letter first in this strategic, card-based, online board game for 2/4 players Use powerful ability cards to speed ahead or sabotage rivals. Place blocks, lay traps & think two steps ahead each turn. Bring in varied card packs for a fresh, chaotic challenge every game! ⚔️

name: Snow Bros. Classic
summary: Beat the final boss and save the princess!

name: Sniper Warrior Elite
summary: Sniper Warrior Elite is a modern warfare sniping game that places players in the role of a skilled marksman. The game features a single-player campaign with open-ended maps, requiring tactical planning and precision. Players can customize their weapons and gear, adapting to various missions across diverse environments. The gameplay emphasizes realistic ballistics, weather effects, and stealth mechanics as players navigate through forests and urban areas to eliminate targets. Sniper Warrior Elite aims to provide a detailed sniping experience, challenging players to use strategy and marksmanship skills to complete their objectives.

name: Snake Party Extreme
summary: The best Snake game ever made. A chaotic, unforgettable, laugh-out-loud 4-player couch battle. An intense test of your arcade gaming skills. Snake Party Extreme is all of these...and so, so much more!

name: Snoot Runner
summary: Chase the burgers to unlock new friends. Experience the world of Puppolonia as a canine running through the capital city of Puppolonia collecting burgers. The player will collect letters to learn to spell various words related to canines. The player will jump and dodge obstacles in the course on the city streets while collecting power ups, letters, and burgers.

name: Snowfall's Mystery
summary: A psychological interactive novel about a floppy disk with a mysterious program. Help Elliot cope with his mental issues and uncover the secret of the floppy disk.

name: SnaPaul 2: Anomalies
summary: After a prank gone horribly wrong, you're ensnared in a nightmarish loop crafted by your own mother. As you delve into her twisted past, the boundaries between reality and madness blur. Unravel the sinister secrets and confront the malevolent forces that bind you.

name: Snakewitch
summary: The action-packed tale of the exiled SNAKEWITCH. Swing and strike your way through cursed areas, battling monsters and freeing possessed creatures along the way. With your snake companion, break into the Academy and discover the true reason that the accursed SNAKEWITCH was banished.

name: Snakespell
summary: Snake meets spellcasting! Collect elements and cast spells in PvP battles to become the Academy's top wizard.

name: Sniffin for Bones
summary: Sniffin for Bones is a cozy game about finding little hidden bones and solving some relaxing puzzles. Unwind with a game that doesn't force you to have fast reaction times, complex inputs or be a puzzle wizard.

name: Snap & Grab
summary: Do crimes using only your camera and your crew! In Snap & Grab, explore a puzzle adventure world where any photo you take could be the key to cool crime success. Travel to exotic locations, photograph treasures and reveal threats, then combine your photos in unique ways to create a rad heist plan.

name: Snogbert
summary: One-room 2D platformer that combines arcade run-and-jump gameplay with roguelike progression. Roll the dice and challenge random missions to help Snogbert find his missing shards and get back home! Ready to roll?

name: Snowmelt Manor
summary: Snowmelt Manor is a puzzle game where you push boxes to solve challenges. Explore an abandoned manor deep in the forest and gradually uncover its mysteries.

name: Sneaky Pirates
summary: Sneaky Pirates is a fast-paced online multiplayer social deduction game for 4 players. Hide among ships, steal from rivals, and use power-ups to escape or fight back. Play it safe or go all-in—no winner is safe until the last second! Customize your ship and be the king of pirates!

name: Snakes and Ladders Championship
summary: 3D Snakes and Ladders is a visually enhanced digital version of the classic board game, set in a dynamic 3D environment. Players move across a 3D board filled with animated snakes and ladders.
publishers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

name: Snake Princess
summary: Snake Princess is a short snake-inspired puzzle game in an NES style. Originally created for the NES Jam 2025, with the theme of 'Save the Princess'.

name: Sniper Elite: Resistance - Wrath of the Resistance Weapon and Skins Pack
summary:
The Wrath of the Resistance Weapon and Skins Pack is free to all players. It includes the fully automatic Mod.712 pistol which has an incredible rate of fire, which also makes it hard to control. Also included are the Marie Chevalier character skin and the Lady of Liberty Skin for Marie. A respected and accomplished member of the Resistance Marie is tactically skilled in the art of stealth and willing to do whatever it takes to liberate her country from tyranny.
Finally, players will also receive the Brushstroke Camo Skin for their weapons. One of the earliest camouflage designs formulated by the British Ministry of Defence as an effective camouflage for British Army Paratroopers, the design is created with wide swathes of colour applied with a large brush.
The pack includes:
- Marie Chevalier Character Skin
- Lady of Liberty Character Skin (Marie)
- Mod.712 Pistol
- Brushstroke Camo Weapon Skin

name: Sniper Elite: Resistance - Mud and Thunder Mission, Weapons and Skin Pack
summary: A Resistance contact has gone missing following reports that Axis forces have invaded the region. In this new mission you must locate the contact to uncover their valuable intel

name: Snow Forest
summary: here you need to survive and wait for help, but to survive, look for supplies, build bases and weapons, and wait

name: Snail Race
summary: Race to learn in Snail Race!  Answer fun questions to boost your snail’s speed — the more you know, the faster you go! A colorful and silly educational game for kids, combining learning with fast-paced fun.

name: Snapto
summary: SNAPto is a challenging Sokoban-Style puzzle exploration game centred around a single snapping mechanic. Players are given a series of dense and deceptively simple puzzles with increasing difficulty. Each puzzle is unique in introducing a principle of the game's core mechanics and acts as a bridge to lead the Player to new places. The player is asked to discover the rules and history of this world, but is never certain of what is true.

name: Snow Rider 3D
summary: Snow Rider 3D takes snowboarding to the next level! Master your skills as you race down picturesque mountains, perform tricks, and unlock new gear. The immersive experience and stunning graphics will keep you coming back for more. Are you ready to conquer the slopes?

name: Snowbird Solitaire
summary: Create your own tropical paradise in Snowbird Solitaire. Take on hundreds of tri-peaks levels, overcome outrageous obstacles and decorate the island for your snowbird guests.

name: Snowboard Girl
summary: Get ready to tear down the slopes on your snowboard. Avoid deadly obstacles, keep your balance and cool nerve, and strive to go faster and make it to the finish line before the clock runs out.

name: Snow Beast Chess
summary: "Snow Beast Chess" is a board game, the whole game screen is divided into two areas, there is a river in the middle to divide the two areas, there are bridges to allow each other's animals to cross the river, to win, you must occupy the base of the animals on that side to win.

name: Snack Machine Change
summary: A 10-minute story about a boy who is waiting at the hospital for his sister's check-up to be finished.

name: Snapshot Spirit Live!
summary: Play as jetpack-flying photographer Katie as she hunts ghosts in this educational photography game with minimalist 1-bit-inspired graphics and a Game Boy-inspired soundtrack.

name: Snake
summary: The classic and pure Snake game.

name: Sneaky Claws
summary: Blend in, hunt your friends, and become the sneakiest animal at the party!

name: Snowboarding
summary: Snowboarding is an anaglyph 3D snowboard game.

name: Snail Trail
summary: “SnaiL TraiL” is a wild co-op action game where armored snails battle for survival, leaving behind more than just slime — they spread pure chaos. Play solo or team up, slide, shoot, and prove that speed means nothing when you're a snail with attitude.A GAMEPAD is required for a cooperative game.

name: Snake and Rhino in the Sketchbook
Snoopy & The Great Mystery Club
summary: Join Snoopy and the gang in an all-new mystery adventure packed with charm, clever puzzles, and heartwarming friendships! Step into Snoopy’s paws and detective hat as you explore the town, solve challenging cases, and uncover hidden secrets—with help from the lovable Peanuts gang.

name: SnowRunner: Season 15 - Oil & Dirt
summary:
Oil & Dirt is Season 15 of SnowRunner. Included in the Year 4 Pass. Requires the base game SnowRunner to run.

Québec is bursting with exciting projects, and they need you to construct an oil platform by delivering building materials and a massive anchor. Link roads together to form a new highway network, help organize a major fishing festival and more, with 2 new trucks across 2 brand new maps.

Season 15: Oil & Dirt includes:

• Two new 4km² maps set in Québec, Canada. Complete new missions across a new winter region traversed by tall mountains and frozen rivers.
• Two new vehicles: the Sleiter ST 816 “Elephant”, a 6-wheel Heavy Duty tractor able to pull even the heaviest loads, and the Mercer K520, an agile and versatile Off-road truck with exceptional capabilities in exploration and rescue scenarios.
• New activities: Help Québec companies with major infrastructure projects after the Canadian winter had them grind to halt, and celebrate the region’s angling industry by helping organize a major fishing festival.

name: Snout About
summary: Snout About is a chaotic co-op game where you and your friends play as dogs dragging your human through a stylized 3D park to catch the bus—avoid obstacles, collect treats, and work together to be the best buddies!

name: SnowRunner: Rezvani Tank
summary:
The SnowRunner garage keeps on getting bigger and better with a new scout looking as mean as it is powerful, the Rezvani Tank!

Fitted with the same engine as its big brother the Rezvani Hercules, it separates itself with softer suspensions, a lighter chassis and maximum ground clearance giving it incredible agility and power-to-weight ratio.

name: Snooze: A Choice
summary: Wake up. Get ready. Go to work. Wake up. Get ready. Go to work. Wake up. Get ready. Feed the demon? Go to work. Daily life might be getting to you, but your medication is taking care of that, right? Or maybe it's making things worse. Rise and grind or choose to snooze?

name: Snow Fall
summary: Snow • Fall is a modern deck builder roguelike where you grow exponentially stronger to craft destructive item and card combinations. Make your way through the country of Heijing as you discover more ways to play and more hidden truths as the story unveils.

name: Snaplt
summary: This is a casual jigsaw puzzle game. All you need to do is use the mouse to drag the pieces to the correct positions, and when you complete the puzzle and form a complete picture, you can unlock the picture gallery.

name: Snowscape
summary: Snowscape is a roguelite adventure that combines top-down survival with snowmobile racing. Race down risky snowy mountains by day and survive the monstrous horrors lurking in the dark by night. Can you escape the twisted nightmare of this mysterious, frozen wilderness?

name: Snapshot Girls
summary: Solve puzzles, uncover secrets, and marvel at every detail of stunning photorealistic masterpieces!

name: Snekteks
summary: Snekteks is a fully physics-based snake game. Experience different environments with other players with unexpected new twists and turns. Relax, explore or join quick action-packed matches - the choice is yours.

name: Snowbody
summary: two young men venture outwards on an errand, but get caught up in some fiery feelings they have for each other. one thing leads to another and they..... they discover a body??!

name: Snatch Squad
summary: Imagine Payday in an open world like GTA — built entirely of blocks. Snatch Squad is a co‑op crime sim in a voxel city. Plan and execute heists, launder money through legit businesses, and outsmart the police.

name: Snack and Quack
summary:
Snack and Quack is a 2D pixel art puzzle game designed for casual players.
The goal is to guide all the ducklings to eat the scattered bread in each level. The game focuses on logical challenges and progressive difficulty across two distinct maps to keep players engaged.

name: Snekcross
summary:
A one screen puzzle with a very long snek crossing a very wide chasm.
Good luck sweet sneky boi.

name: Snapshot Girls 2
summary: Solve puzzles, uncover secrets, and marvel at every detail of stunning photorealistic masterpieces!

name: SnowRunner: Freightliner & Western Star Dual Pack
summary:
The Freightliner & Western Star Dual Pack brings two new trucks to your SnowRunner garage: the Heavy Duty-class Freightliner FLD 120 and Heavy-class Western Star 6900XD.

This DLC is not included in the Year 1, Year 2, Year 3 or Year 4 Passes.

name: SnowBall FPS
summary: SnowBall-FPS is a snowball fight game, multiplayer (LAN). Hide, attack, dig holes for cover, use stealth tactics, get upgrades, collect your snow reserves, or just find the nearest large slope and slide down it for fun with your mates.

name: Snake Game Ultra Core
summary: Snake Game Ultra Core is an arena shooter where you play as a snake with a shotgun, escaping from a laboratory and seeking revenge on your enemies.

name: Snoopy & The Great Mystery Club: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Ultimate Snoopy & The Great Mystery Club Experience — worthy of the world’s most beloved beagle!

The Deluxe Edition includes the full base game plus exclusive extras: Snoopy’s legendary Joe Cool outfit, two Red Baron mini-games (Frozen Cave and Scorching Desert), and two soapbox racing challenges (Great Pumpkin Patch and Off-Road Challenge). Each adds new environments, obstacles, and ways to play.

Rounding out the package is the 75th Anniversary Comic Collection, featuring 75 full-color strips viewable in-game. With bonus adventures and classic Peanuts charm, the Deluxe Edition is the most complete Snoopy & The Great Mystery Club experience.

name: Snoopy & The Great Mystery Club: Joe Cool Fun Pack
summary:
Fly, race, and roll with Snoopy like never before! The Joe Cool Fun Pack celebrates 75 years of Peanuts with bonus content, including Snoopy’s iconic Joe Cool outfit, two Red Baron mini-games (Frozen Cave and Scorching Desert), and two soapbox racing challenges (Great Pumpkin Patch and Off-Road Challenge). Each offers new environments packed with obstacles and playful challenges.

The pack also features the 75th Anniversary Comic Collection, with 75 full-color comics viewable in-game. Combining new adventures and classic Peanuts charm, the Joe Cool Fun Pack adds flair and fun to the Snoopy & The Great Mystery Club experience.

name: Snowflake Master
summary: Create your own unique paper snowflake. Make up or repeat ready-made patterns that will take your skills to the next level. Let your imagination run wild!

name: Snoutbreakers
summary: Do you have what it takes to become the champion of the Snoutbreakers, an underground fighting circuit? Fight your way through gauntlets of furry fighters armed with their fists, weapons, and more as you try to beat down everyone in your path.

name: Snake Eyes
summary: Snake Eyes is a bullet hell top down 2D roguelike where you assume the role of a vengeful snake on a quest to take down the casino that took her arm. Parry, dodge, and take revenge with your homemade Slot Machine Gun while collecting unique items to assist you on your path of revenge.

name: Snake: Secret Treasure
summary:
Snake: Secret Treasure reimagines the classic snake game as a modern puzzle-adventure experience.
Across 120 challenging levels, your logic, reflexes, and strategy will be pushed to the limit as you search for hidden treasures.

Features:
120-Level Campaign – Divided into 8 themed worlds (Desert, Ice, Fire, and more).

Progressive Challenges – Each section introduces new mechanics: a fire-breathing snake, Sokoban-style box pushing, invisible tail segments, speed changes, and more.

Treasure Hunt – Collect every gold piece without dying and reach the exit gate.

Classic Meets Modern – Nostalgia of the original snake combined with fresh puzzle and challenge mechanics.

name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts: Merciless Marksman
summary: Strike hard and fast with the Merciless Marksman DLC Weapon Pack, featuring four lethal firearms for the ultimate in high-precision warfare. No self-respecting assassin should be without it... assuming they want to last more than five minutes.

name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts: Arsenal Pack
summary: Take out enemies with this extensive collection of weapons, featuring a full set of rifles, pistols, a shotgun, and even a crossbow. Whether your strategy is to stealthily bring down a mark or end their days in a bloody fountain of viscera, the Arsenal Pack has you covered.

name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts: World Flags Skin Pack
summary: Get the Fun with Flags Weapon Skins and expand your weaponry customization even further.

name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts: Skins Pack
summary: Own the best-looking weapons in the theatre of war with the Skins Pack, featuring a complete set of 14 weapon skins for Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts. Make your mark and skin any weapon in your arsenal with these unique looks.

name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts: Steam Mist Weapon Skin
summary: Add some Steam style to your weapons as you complete contracts with this exclusive, themed skin.

name: Snoopy and the Great Mystery Club

Snack time action game is a 2D action game where you can easily enjoy feeling like a hero or a monster in various situations! 7 types of situations + α&20+ playable characters! summary: Developed in cooperation with snipers from several Russian elite Special Forces units. It is intended for precise individual target engagement at ranges up to 1000 meters. A small stock of these rifles were confiscated by Siberian Wolves and are now available on the black market.

name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts: Savage Sniper Weapon Pack
summary: Siberia is a treacherous place and shows little mercy to those unprepared. The best way to ensure that isn't you? Set your long-range sights on the Savage Sniper Weapons Pack, featuring 3 diverse but equally deadly tools of the trade - PR15 HERA, Tai Hu SR3 and MSSR 10.

Find new friends hidden in each map. Fast-paced local multiplayer with simple controls that anyone can pick up and enjoy.

summary: Clear snowy slopes and resort roads with powerful plows in this DLC for Snow Plowing Simulator. Keep ski runs safe, resorts accessible, and winter holidays running smoothly.

name: Snip Snap
summary:
Welcome to Snip Snap!

Test your reaction speed and precision in this exciting game!
- Hit targets to score points!
- Collect coins to unlock abilities!
- Break your high score!
- Face epic duels against a variety of enemies!
- Open multiplier boxes for a change to get extra coins!
- Customize your warrior by tapping its icon in the duel mode!

name: Sniper Elite: Resistance - Striking Range
summary: In the new Striking Range Campaign Mission, you must prevent a V1 rocket barrage from decimating the allied invasion fleet ahead of D-Day whilst attempting a covert rescue of the Resistance operative Carillon.

name: Sniper Elite: Resistance - Commando Weapon Pack
summary: The Commando Weapon & Skin Pack is a free content update for Sniper Elite: Resistance that adds the deadly DL Carbine Rifle and the Covert Elite Rifle Wrap to your arsenal.

name: Snow!
summary:
A unique FPS (first person skier) game on the Playdate. Enjoy infinite skiing in a full 3d environment, loosely set in the French Alps. A zero carbon footprint virtual trip!

Chain tricks to earn in-game money and buy gear in the station shop.

name: Snake
summary: Experience the classic Snake in a whole new way – this time with brains!

name: Snake-A-Roid
summary:
Snake-A-Roid is an Arcade style game that’s been lost down the back of the sofa.

Featuring a clean vector-like style, and crunchy chip tune sound track, it evokes an era where games taunted you to spend your money, as you climbed to the top of that high score table.

name: Sneaky All-Nighter 2
summary: It's time for another sneaky all-nighter! Play to your heart's content in all-new situations—just don't get caught!

name: Snowball Fight 2025
summary: In this game you start on one team during a snow storm. You can pick up snowballs and throw it at the opponents. Watch as each gets more challenging and the opponents throw snowballs faster. If you survive you win the snowball fight

name: Snatch
summary: Snatch is a wild twist on classic Pong—faster, flashier, and loaded with abilities. Deflect, dash, and unleash chaotic powers in fast paced matches. Battle relentless enemies in 1v1 duels or survive 1v3 chaos—dash, deflect, and dominate in fast-paced, single-player arcade mayhem.

name: Snailshell
summary: a short visual novel about a girl and her snail

name: Snafubar

name: Sniper Camouflage Orange Spy Warrior I Buried Two Bodies in the Garden and the Police Haven't Figured Out Yet That They're Missing Because They Were a Lonely Old Couple Who Had No Relatives Simulator 2026
summary: Sniper simulator game with sponge bob graphics

name: Snow Bros. Classic Collection
summary:
It’s always more fun to throw a snowball than to be hit by one!

Toaplan‘s hit Snow Bros. is back! This arcade-style, fixed-screen platformer follows brothers Nick and Tom through epic levels in the Kingdom of Hottoda to save two trapped princesses, each possessing the magic of snow… and the only hope for the realm. As evil King Atchich seeks to take over the world, the snowmen we love must set out to storm the enemy’s fortress and rescue their princesses!

Shoot snow at your enemies, picking up items to enhance your fighting, from speed enhancements to shot powerups, becoming giant, and more. Each level features not only enemies but a boss fight, with unique characters to size up and snowball!

Whether you have loved them since the 90s or are just discovering the snowy goodness now, Snow Bros. will show you exactly why it’s such a timeless game.

Included Games:

Snow Bros.
Snow Bros.: Nick & Tom
Snow Bros. Jr.

name: Snekromancy
summary: Snake, but you summon the undead in a roguelite horde-survivor dungeon.
